text: De, Jisasɨlɨn yila wulu kavik galaveve, “De, balañjun anɨkɨk wain maŋam yañjik jak mfɨsakɨk ka fulapayi.2.22 Anañ valan kavik paveve, valan yetɨk jak mfɨsak yivevekandi yika mfɨdɨŋevekandi wain maŋam suwove. Kavik pavalen wun gɨfɨmbe kɨvakandi pɨtɨwɨkɨ wain maŋamɨn salave sakapa. Kape jak mfɨsakɨn yakakatɨk tonapa. Kayi. Anɨkɨk wain anɨkɨk jak mfɨsakɨk fulapa.”
